snippet: Some projections have Atlanta catcher Brian McCann landing a $100 million contract, but a recent lack of durability and a potential decline in his 30s could be problems.
abstract: Some projections have Atlanta Braves catcher Brian McCann landing a $100 million contract; recent lack of durability and a potential decline as he heads toward his 30s, however, make it more likely that he will be the most likely of the big-ticket free agents to end up becoming an albatross for the team that signs him.
lead_paragraph: Some projections have Atlanta catcher Brian McCann landing a $100 million contract, but a recent lack of durability and a potential decline in his 30s could be problems.

headline.main: With Gritty Slugger Brian McCann, It’s Buyer Beware
headline.print_headline: With Slugging Catcher, It’s Buyer Beware
